alert.note: Alert for Hennepin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 1:39PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...URBAN AND SMALL STREAM FLOODING EXPECTED... Minor flooding will occur in the following counties... Hennepin... * Until 300 PM CDT. * At 136 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported urban and small stream flooding was occurring in North Minneapolis due to slow moving rainfall where 1 to 3 inches of rain have fallen. * Some locations that will experience minor flooding include... Minneapolis, Brooklyn Park, Plymouth, Maple Grove, Minnetonka, St. Louis Park, Brooklyn Center, Fridley, Golden Valley, Hopkins, Crystal, and New Hope.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Excessive runoff from heavy rainfall will cause flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other drainage areas and low lying spots.
